position.title: Lead UI Developer
details: Leads team through expansion into new regions across North and South America, demonstrating skilled leadership in navigating complex design and technical challenges while fostering collaboration.
Responsible for team velocity to ensure delivery of bi-weekly releases.
Maintains culture of innovation and continuous improvement, empowering team members to embrace design-thinking practices and design scalable systems.
Provides architectural recommendations and works closely with business stakeholders to develop and refine requirements for our product roadmap.

position.title: UI Developer
details: Worked within a small UI development team to build, test, and deploy production-level code to all GM dealerships within the United States.
Led UI design implementation; collaborated with UX team to enhance usability.
Conducted research for future projects and developed proof of concepts (POCs) to determine feasibility of modular and mobile-first technologies.
Running a lean startup aimed at creating a range of digital applications & tools.
Currently working on Shoebox, our first comprehensive financial tool to help people organize and maximize their Health Savings Accounts (HSAs).
Expanding our lineup at The Blocks to offer a complete solution for individuals’ financial needs, all along their journey to financial growth.
Developed a new design system for the implementation of a new technology stack and learning management system (LMS), built on Drupal.
Executed LMS layout, UI, and branding to support the company’s training goals.
Developed marketing collateral to share with customers and prospective buyers.
Held up-to-date, in-depth understanding of software & hardware features and nuances to be an educational resource for customers.

position.title: Visual Merchandising Specialist
details: Executed retail visual merchandising resets during product launches to ensure retail demo content was correctly configured and displayed.

position.title: Product Specialist
details: Maintained expert knowledge of Apple Hardware, Software, & Services to support customers and team.

items: <small>(for indexing purposes: Illustrator, InDesign, Photoshop, After Effects, Xd, Premiere)</small>
